Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class TransactionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.TransactionController
public class TransactionController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for an orderly flow of a Transaction

  • Method Details

    • startTransaction

      public void startTransaction​(DevelopmentCard card, PersonalBoard board, int cardSlot)
      Starts a new transaction of type DevelopmentCardRequest for the purchase of a Development Card
      Parameters:
      card - DevelopmentCard to be bought
      board - Player's personal board
      cardSlot - the selected cardSlot

    • startTransaction

      public void startTransaction​(ProductionPower power, PersonalBoard board) throws ProductionPowerAlreadyUsedException
      Starts a new transaction of type ProductionPowerRequest for the activation of a production power
      Parameters:
      power - Production Power to be activated
      board - Player's personal board
      Throws:
      ProductionPowerAlreadyUsedException - If the production power has already been used during the turn

    • addGenericSource

      public void addGenericSource​(Resource resource, StorageType source) throws TransactionRequirementsNotMetException, InsufficientResourcesException
      Selects a Resource and a storage origin to be used for a generic resource slot
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource type
      source - Origin of the used resource
      Throws:
      TransactionRequirementsNotMetException - If the transaction does not contain generic inputs
      InsufficientResourcesException - If the resource is not available in the specified storage source

    • removeGenericSource

      public void removeGenericSource​(Resource resource, StorageType source) throws ResourceNotFoundInPaymentBufferException
      Removes a source previously added to be used for a generic resource slot
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource type
      source - Origin of the used resource
      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundInPaymentBufferException - If the generic source was not specified in the first place

    • addGenericOutput

      public void addGenericOutput​(Resource resource) throws ResourceNotInsertableException
      Selects a Resource type to be gained from the generic resource slot
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource type
      Throws:
      ResourceNotInsertableException - If the transaction does not contain any generic output

    • getUsedProductionPowers

      public java.util.List<ProductionPower> getUsedProductionPowers()
      Returns a list of production powers already used during the turn
      Returns:
      List of production powers used during the turn

    • executeTransaction

      public void executeTransaction() throws TransactionRequirementsNotMetException
      Finalizes the transaction, checking all requirements are met
      Throws:
      TransactionRequirementsNotMetException - If the transaction is executed improperly

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      To be called at the end of a turn where production powers are activated empties usedProductionPowers list and temporary storage
